org.jwebsocket.plugins.jmx.util

Class JMXHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jwebsocket.plugins.jmx.util.JMXHandler

  • public class JMXHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that dynamically converts the Map data type to the CompositeData data type.
    Author:
    Lisdey Pérez Hernández(lisdey89, UCI)
